phrases: Well, she is definitely from a duke's family.
We did lose all of the money we won at the harem event, after all.
In return for breaking Miss Maria's curse,
I am going to use mine to fix up my clinic.
I wonder what I am going to do with all this.
Hey, why do not you use it to open up a shop?
Maybe you could sell monster materials.
That is a decent future, no?
I would be happy to help.
No, it is my admin and accounting skills that Noir needs.
Let us just compromise and say Noir and I will...
I will contact you guys later.
I received that for saving a duke's daughter.
Believe it or not, there is 100 million rels in there!
What are you going to do with all this money?
I am not exactly sure yet.
Noir, I cannot let you be the only breadwinner in this family.
Why not leave this money with me?
You are planning to go to the casino, are not you?
You are so bright, my son!
To put it lightly, he is absolute trash.
I never want to work again!
He brings shame upon our family.
How about opening up a shop?
Maybe an item shop... one that handles rare materials.
Then let us go with that.
Father, please find a good location and do the paperwork
we will need to submit to the government.
I will keep a very close eye on him so that he does not pocket the money.
H-How little do you trust me?
And so, to collect monster materials...
I decided to conquer more of the dungeon.
I knew you were faking it.
Well, that is because you never come to see me!
Er, I just came here the other day.
I wanted to gather some treasures and materials.
And I would like to get stronger.
Then you should Get Creative and make the Dungeon Elevator skill
so you can conquer it more efficiently.
Once you have been to a floor, you can instantly travel there next time.
Though once you use it, you will not be able to use it again for another hour.
I will get right to it.
Skills Skills Skills Skills Skills Skills
Also, I would recommend the Blinding Light skill.
Just like the name suggests, it is great at blinding things.
I guess I will add that, too, then.
Skills Skills Skills Skills Skills Skills
I should give it a test run...
I forgot to close my eyes!
Oh, you are such a klutz, Noir!
I-It is sort of strange having you laugh at me in that state.
I did not find any noteworthy monsters on the third or fourth floors.
Then I got to the fifth...
I sense a presence over there.
Did they fight and end up killing each other?
I-I need to use Discerning Eye!
I am not getting any information?!
Th-Then I will just have to...
And then Dungeon Elevator to get the hell outta here!
You have no reason to fear me.
I am not suspicious in the least.
Er, I am not sure about that.
Why does it have a tulip growing on its head?!
Human, having acknowledged the talent you must have to reach this floor,
I will take you to the sixth floor, and in return,
I would like you to search for someone.
I-I accepted his offer for a ride, but...
M-Mr. Lion, you are very strong.
My friend gave me this name.
It is my pride and joy.
So who is this person you want me to find on the sixth floor?
Long ago, I accompanied my friend here.
We made it to the fifth floor handily,
but then my friend said he would explore the sixth on his own.
There will be a lot of traps ahead.
I will use my skills to get rid of them.
I promise I will be back.
So I have been waiting this whole time.
H-How long have you been waiting?
Elves live long lives, some as long as 500 years.
You did not consider just going to the sixth floor?
I promised my friend Vashelle that I would wait on the fifth floor.
A promise to a friend is absolute.
He is very considerate of his friend.
I left Tigerson behind and came to the sixth floor.
Blinding Light is meant for blinding others.
It will not really help me look around.
Skills Skills Skills Skills Skills Skills
All right, now I should be able to see.
It sorta looks like a person, but...
That is definitely not a person!
And now its friends are here!
I-Its body breaks into six parts.
So that is why it is called a Sextuple Zombie...
I will use the other door to get outside.
He seems different from the other zombies...
Why does he have a tulip on his head?
The Hidden Dungeon Only I Can Enter.
That is not going to work.
I need to turn him back somehow.
Okay, I will delete that Zombified skill.
Are you the elf named Vashelle?
I actually need to talk to you.
As promised, he is been waiting on the fifth floor.
It is been more than 300 years.
He is truly a great friend.
I just randomly named him Tigerson, but he fell in love with the name.
Before I came to this dungeon,
he saved me, even though he did not know me.
He tried to leave without saying a word, so I ended up asking him
if he would like to be my friend.
The other 990,000 creatures I have encountered all pointed a weapon at me.
You are the only one who reached out to me.
I have never had a friend before.
After that, I came to this dungeon to search for a treasure to send
I happened to find the password in an ancient text.
And that is how you and Tigerson got to the fifth floor.
There will be a lot of traps ahead.
I will use my skills to get rid of them.
I promise I will be back.
I can hardly call myself a friend if he is just protecting me all the time.
Up until recently, Emma had to protect me all the time.
And you saw how I ended up.
How am I supposed to face him again?
But I cannot keep him waiting any longer.
I see that you are safe, my friend.
Let us give up on conquering this dungeon.
If that is what you wish.
My love might still be waiting for me.
But even if I am wrong about that, I think this is for the best.
But I told you before, right?
Other races are not allowed into my homeland.
I wasted 350 years of your time...
You want to return home to your beloved.
No one can stop matters of the heart.
I waited because I wanted to.
The days I spent waiting for you had meaning.
I ended up using Dungeon Elevator to return to the first floor,
Tigerson and Vashelle were also heading toward the exit,
but I am sure they had a lot to talk about.
Noir, I will repay this favor to you someday.
Do not even worry about it.
Tigerson, once things calm down, I promise to come see you again.
I am tough, if nothing else.
The days I spent with you... were so much fun.
Noir, I thank you for what you have done.
What are you going to do now, Tigerson?
For now, I will go back to the fifth floor.
I got curious, so I went back, too.
He seemed pretty calm, but I guess he is actually angry...
I prepared myself for the day I would have to part with him.
And yet, now that I must face that reality...
Having to say goodbye to my loved ones...
To be honest, it was so sad and painful that I did not want to imagine it.
It felt like I was losing a part of myself.
Actually, why do not you come live at my place?
It is much more comfortable sleeping on a warm carpet than this cold stone floor.
I shall take you up on that offer.
I can at least serve as your guard lion.
Let us go to your home.
Let us go back to our home.
There was another reason that I waited 350 years.
It is been so long since I felt the wind.
Make sure you do not get thrown off!
I-I can quite plainly see that...
Did you make that creature your familiar?
It does not bite, does it?
I would never do such a thing.
When we get our shop up and running, he wants to be our guard lion.
I have a feeling he will eat me if I say no, so...
I will have to make an extra special dinner tonight.
Say, so what is the deal with the tulip?
As you can see, he gets a bit weird over it.
So it is just like what your mother is to me.
Well, anyway, that is how Tigerson joined the Stardia family.
I never would have figured Tigerson had a weak spot like that.
It is so big, Brother Dearest...
